name: CallHelper
body:
### Welcome to CallHelper
### This is a blacklist call block App
### It's simple, efficient, elegant and easy to use

### When you make your own blacklist file, make sure it is encoded in UTF-8.

### Blocked contact format:
+86 138-8888-8888,Suspect Spam  
021-66666666,Suspect Spam  
13688888888,Suspect Spam  
02155555555,Suspect Spam  

[Blacklist file format is here, just few bytes.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DesmondJew/CallHelperDatabase/master/blacklistFormat)

[Blacklist patch 2016-08-31(1.8M).]
(https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DesmondJew/CallHelperDatabase/master/blacklistPatch2016-08-31.txt)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
